nodes.text: A security droid operated for the New Republic at the Karthon Chop Fields, a scrapyard where prisoners of the New Republic were sentenced to serve. Around 9 ABY, the security droid approached the prisoner Migs Mayfeld as he worked, ordering him to salute in the presence of New Republic Marshal Cara Dune. Dune remanded Mayfeld into her custody, and the droid accepted, ordering the prisoner to follow her. Mayfeld was confused by the situation, and the droid repeated its order, threatening him to comply within three seconds. The prisoner relented, following Dune to her starship.

The security droid appeared in "Chapter 15: The Believer," the seventh episode of the second season of the television series The Mandalorian, which was released on Disney+ on December 11, 2020. The droid was portrayed by Donald Mills.
